sentence.text: #myfirstTweet @IndianEmbRiyadh @SEOC_Karnataka @SushmaSwaraj @ajxtopcop the great job in government of karnataka i really appreciate.... @KicchaSudeep hai sudeep sir, iam big fan of you sir @kavyahr5 hi kavya how are you Revenue department nalli yallaru chennagiddara @narendramodi Sir, I am Kiran Karnataka State is drought, farmers are suicide in Karnataka State sir please release crop loss on drought @KicchaSudeep hi kiccha sudeep sir how are you @PMOIndia Sir, Iam requested to sir you Karnataka faced drought situation please release the amount sir and please visit the karnataka pls @PMOIndia sir, i am kiran 9964868724 this is my number i don`t english only kannada no corrections sir please @SushmaSwaraj Madam your grate madam @Jaggesh2 i support to you @narendramodi Sir,Please Release the Drought Amount in problems Drinking Water,Cattle's Fodder Crop loss in Karnataka Paddy,Ragi,Tur,Maize, @AdarshGuruRaj ok friend @SEOC_Karnataka Sir, Please help https://t.co/CFoVbHrAYO @SushmaSwaraj @SEOC_Karnataka Wish You Happy Republic Day 26.01.2017 Trace Email Address Source https://t.co/SYQcYI74pW via @wimia @INCIndia @PChidambaram_IN i am congress member @SushmaSwaraj wish you happy birthday to madam SAVE WATER IN @SEOC_Karnataka https://t.co/fZAPFKJTsR @CMofKarnataka great achievements in KSRTC by Govt.

of karnataka congrats @RVaralakshmi hai madam how are you @CNNnews18 super sir technology improvement in india @RVaralakshmi hai madam i am big fan of you @amitshah @abhishekvhp23 all the best BJP party wish you @officialhmgroup happy holi @TimesNow Please Karnataka Drought situation videos telecast @Amulya_moulya amulya madam i am your big fan your all movies super madam @RakshithaPremFC @raginidwivedi24 @actressanjjanaa @suguna_n @Raghu67Raghu @KicchaSudeep @KicchanHudugru @SDKSFA @27parims @KKSFC_Official @ShivuaDDa Happy Birthday to Rakshithaprem Madam Watch Akshatha Udupa reach for the stars in the quest to take https://t.co/nPUKaf2xvu#3209 Government First Grade Collage Devanahalli, Bangalore Rural District https://t.co/IaeQtabVsE @RadhikaPandit7 @NimmaRPFC @chitraloka @NamCinema hai good morning madam @thukralnikita super madam @MsKajalAggarwal Good night sweet dreams madam @shivuaDDa Wish you Happy Birthday to Shivanna Good Night Sweet Dreams https://t.co/7oYN1ZCy0f @suvarnanewstv SAVE TREES SAVE LIONS SAVE FOREST Happy Friendship Day @publictvnews @suvarnanewstv @ETVNews_Kannada @DDChandanaNews @DDNational @NDRFHQ @ndmaindia @tv9kannada https://t.co/CzsPN0LglM @nimmaupendra Sir, You come to the politics @CTRavi_BJP @CMofKarnataka Wish You Happy Birthday Sir @NDRFHQ Karnataka persons strucked please save me sir https://t.co/4KgEYba9A4 Wish you Happy Independence Day https://t.co/SqG4jeIiy7 Watch live!
